text:
The Oxygen program, for its first year,
succeeded in enrolling 450 people.

Half of the people who signed up
participated on a recurring basis, every month.
And that's mainly thanks to the AWS Skills Guild,

which allowed us to structure the
network of champions from the start.

So today we have 29 champions
delivering quality content, animation

and above all helping us not only
to structure the program,

but to take charge of the animation
at the end of the first year.
To measure the scaling up, one of our successes was after less than a year of launching this Oxygen Cloud Academy,

to have the organization of Cloud Days,
which was a global event in Thales.

Cloud Vendors with AWS provided us with
quality sessions with high-level speakers,

different business lines who contributed,
each in their specialty,
but also from the group or even external speakers from other French groups who wanted to participate on topics like green IT.

So, with more than 2,000 participants
in the different sessions,

more than 50 speakers provided us
with content for our Cloud Academy

which allows us to serve
in our reference tracks

as additional content to
continue to build additively.
